content:
Sure! Here's a summary of what we have discussed in this phase:

The main components of the system are:

* Data ingest system
* Data processing system
* Statistical analysis system
* Machine learning system
* Prediction system
* Result scaling system
* Web front end
* Monitoring and log aggregation system

We decided not to include a separate data storage system, as a PostgreSQL database should suffice. Testing and debugging is an essential process that needs to be integrated throughout the development lifecycle.

Now that we have identified the main components of the system, we can move on to breaking down each component into smaller tasks.
